backend/main.mo: Actor module managing user profiles, dashboard status, contact info, and public message submissions with admin-gated retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global variables, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages including admin-protected routes within a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal capturing required name and email fields and saving the user's profile through a backend hook.
frontend/src/components/connect/AccessGr: Modal showing a prefilled access-granted email with copy functionality and close actions.
frontend/src/components/connect/DirectCo: Displays official contact info with icons and links for phone, email, and Instagram.
frontend/src/components/connect/Founders: Handles authentication, profile completion, and reveals founder contact details once unlocked.
frontend/src/components/connect/Messagin: Form to submit a message, show success state, and provide email or clipboard export options.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contac: Fetches and displays a direct contact line with a copy-to-clipboard option.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Status: Shows system uptime and NTP status with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/landing/CoreValu: Grid highlighting three core values with icons: audio fidelity, time accuracy, and safety.
frontend/src/components/landing/DigitalC: Live digital clock updating every second with a styled display.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section with animated logo pulse, background, digital clock, and main slogan.
frontend/src/components/landing/Particle: Canvas-based particle animation reacting to mouse movement and connecting nearby particles.
frontend/src/components/landing/ProductS: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/landing/PublicCo: Renders a contact section with email and Instagram links styled with glass UI elements.
frontend/src/components/landing/SyncingI: Creates a layered parallax background with gradient, grid texture, and poster image reacting to scroll.
frontend/src/components/landing/WelcomeN: Displays a vision-themed narrative section with quotes and branding text.
frontend/src/components/layout/DeepTechL: Wraps pages with a themed gradient layout including header and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with navigation links, system indicators, and attribution using dynamic year and routing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation, mobile menu, branding, and optional logout for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/product/Interact: Expandable card showing an image and technical details with alternating layout and interactive controls.
frontend/src/components/routing/AccessDe: Shows an access denied message with options to go home or logout.
frontend/src/components/routing/RequireA: Wrapper enforcing admin access, showing a loader or denial screen when necessary.
Protects routes by requiring authentication and redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Exports brand asset paths, currently defining the logo path.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, initializing access and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCheck.ts: Checks whether the current actor represents an admin caller using a React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactInfo.ts: Fetches contact info from the actor using a React Query hook, enabled once the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to load and save the current user's profile via the actor, with React Query caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardStatus.ts: Retrieves dashboard status from the actor using React Query with a 30‑second refetch interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context provider and hook for authentication, managing identity loading, login, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessageTerminal.ts: Offers hooks to submit messages and fetch all message terminal entries through the actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, gradients, glass panels, and animations for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AchievementsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of milestone achievements with styled cards and verification indicators.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Shows the admin dashboard with user greeting, status cards, and a contact module.
frontend/src/pages/BoardPage.tsx: Renders interactive founder cards that reveal descriptions on hover or tap.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectSupportPage.ts: Provides public messaging and contact sections with a message form and direct contact registry.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the main landing page using hero, narrative, values, and public contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/LegalTechnicalDocsPag: Renders a legal and technical documentation page with IP ownership details and an electrical safety audit section. Includes signatures and structured content panels.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays a detailed privacy policy outlining data collection, usage, security, retention, and user rights. Structured into multiple sections using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDeepDivePage.t: Shows an interactive deep-dive into TT‑1 hardware components using 3D component cards. Defines component metadata and renders them in a styled layout with a blueprint backdrop.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Presents the Terms of Service including IP ownership, usage rules, liability limits, and update policies. Uses a styled container with structured sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters. Supports hash-based routing and persistence via sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, themes, plugins, and extended utilities. Defines container settings and design tokens for the app’s UI.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, outlining the open‑architecture rebuild plan, UI/UX directives, branding constraints, feature list, and known scope conflicts. Contains image requirements, admin/auth rules, and notes for implementing the multi-page deep‑tech portal.
